New Records: James Harden moved into second place on the NBA's career 3-point list with 2,874 three-pointers.
Key Match Events: James Harden had 20 points and 11 assists to help the Los Angeles Clippers beat the Utah Jazz 116-105.
Ivica Zubac had 22 points and 11 rebounds for Los Angeles.
Norman Powell added 18 points for the Clippers.
Jordan Clarkson scored 21 points for Utah.
Lauri Markkanen had 18 points and 10 rebounds for Utah.
Mo Bamba made his Clippers debut with nine points and eight rebounds in 15 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers ended a three-game losing streak.
The Clippers led by 23 points in the first half to win their fourth consecutive game in the new Intuit Dome.
The Jazz are 0-2 on a four-game trip.
The Clippers have a four-game winning streak in their new building after losing their first four games.
